name: When distributed systems Go wrong with Kelsey Hightower, Carlisia Thompson, & Stevenson Jean-Pierre (Go Time #156)
summary: Monitoring and debugging distributed systems is hard. In this episode, we catch up with Kelsey Hightower, Stevenson Jean-Pierre, and Carlisia Thompson to get their insights on how to approach these challenges and talk about the tools and practices that make complex distributed systems more observable.
